reuters.title: SESOSTRIS SELLS 18,000 TONNES BARLEY TO GREECE
reuters.body: Sesostris, the Spanish subsidiary of the international grain trader Dreyfus, sold 18,000 tonnes of barley to Greece for delivery from Mediterranean ports from April 14 to 30, a company spokesman said. He gave no details on price. The barley has a 14 pct humidity. Reuter 
